token-img.Name: Use Token Image
token-img.Hint: Use the combatant's token image instead of its actor's sheet image in the combat tracker.

combatant-color.Name: Color-Code Combatants
combatant-color.Hint: PCs get a green background color in the Combat Tracker; all other combatants' backgrounds are color-coded per their token disposition: Friendly (blue), Neutral (yellow), and Hostile (red).
